column2: "The [Profound Darkness] has revived... It'll consume planets like it's doing with Naberius and regain its power."
"Once the [Profound Darkness] reaches its full power, it'll mean the end of the universe. That said, we must stop it."
"While it tries to consume this planet, it knows we're going to attack it."
"It seems like it's mass producing... [Double]? Still, the number of them it produces is absurd."
"Until you break through the [Double] barrier, we won't be able to reach the [Profound Darkness]."
"The [Profound Darkness] is trying to buy enough time to consume this planet and spread itself across the universe."
"We can't allow it to do that. We have to stop it here... Or the universe is doomed."
"But, it'll be fine. After all, we have you."
"There's no need for me to make calculations. I believe that you'll make it out ok. We all do..."
